LanguageData.Apparel_knightPowerArmor.label: Nova power armor
LanguageData.Apparel_knightPowerArmor.description: Nova armor is armor with a medieval appearance.\n\nIt looks like medieval armor, but it has the same defense as power armor, and has a small ranged shield and a built-in combat support system.
LanguageData.Apparel_knight_Combat_Helmet.label: Nova power armor helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_knight_Combat_Helmet.description: The Nova Armor helmet is a power helmet that looks like a helmet from the Middle Ages.\n\nThe helmet with a medieval look has power armor-like defense and has a built-in hit assist device.
LanguageData.Apparel_Fenrir_AdvancedHelmet.label: Fenrir Armor Helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_Fenrir_AdvancedHelmet.descriptio: The Fenrir bulletproof helmet is a bulletproof helmet used by Fenrir soldiers and shows higher defensive power than the reinforced bulletproof helmet.
LanguageData.Apparel_Fenrir_tactics_AdvancedHelmet.de: The Fenrir tactical bulletproof helmet is a helmet with a wolf crest used by the Fenrir unit that protects the front of the face.
LanguageData.Apparel_Fenrir_Snow_Helmet.label: Fenrir Assault Helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_Fenrir_Snow_Helmet.description: A Fenrir Snow Assault Helmet with the bulletproof protection of a scout helmet, and a built-in fire accuracy device to observe enemies in a blizzard.
LanguageData.Apparel_winter_mask.label: Fenrir mask
LanguageData.Apparel_winter_mask.description: The Fenrir Mask is a mask worn by Fenrir soldiers. It has low resistance to toxic terrain and poison attacks.
LanguageData.Apparel_Fenrir_flakvest.label: Fenrir flakvest
LanguageData.Apparel_Fenrir_flakvest.description: The Fenrir body armor is a type of body armor made of moonlight cloth. It's like a normal body armor, but comes with gloves and boots to protect your hands and feet as well.
LanguageData.Apparel_fur_hat.label: bomber cap
LanguageData.Apparel_fur_hat.description: It is a fur hat that was mainly used in cold regions a long time ago.
LanguageData.Apparel_battle_mask.label: battle wolf mask
LanguageData.Apparel_battle_mask.description: A battle mask in wolf form. Similar to the War Mask, but turns the wearer into a wolf-like stealthy hunter.
LanguageData.Apparel_energy_mask.label: energy mask
LanguageData.Apparel_energy_mask.description: A mask with a built-in spirit stone to purify incoming toxins.
LanguageData.Apparel_Fenrir_Snow_flakvest.label: Fenrir Assault Snowfield Body Armor
LanguageData.Apparel_Fenrir_Snow_flakvest.description: The Fenrir body armor is a type of body armor made of moonlight cloth, similar to ordinary body armor, but with gloves and shoes to protect the hands and feet as well.
LanguageData.Apparel_Fenrir_FlakJacket.label: Fenrir Ballistic Cloak
LanguageData.Apparel_Fenrir_FlakJacket.description: A bulletproof cloak exclusively for Fenrir. It is similar to the Fenrir Bulletproof Jacket, but it is a bulletproof suit designed to block fire and chemical weapons rather than firearms.
LanguageData.Apparel_ether_Eltex_Hood.label: Mind Stabilizing Ether Hood
LanguageData.Apparel_ether_Eltex_Hood.description: An etheric hood with an etheric crystal.\n\nHooded armor with a helmet, ether reduces mental threshold and stabilizes nerve fever.
LanguageData.Apparel_ether_Eltex_PowerArmor.label: Mind Stabilizing Ether Armor
LanguageData.Apparel_ether_Eltex_PowerArmor.descripti: It is an etheric armor with an etheric crystal embedded in it.\n\nEtheric armor has low defensive power, but it defends with a shield created by amplifying etheric crystals, stabilizing nerve heat and reducing mental threshold.
